title: Workshop on Utilizing Virtual Reality-Based Science Education Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in science education
context.additional_context: Structured around real-life application cases reflecting adult learners' experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can simulate science concepts in a three-dimensional environment using virtual reality tools.
Learners can propose three or more curriculum integration strategies for VR-based educational tools.
Learners can design activity plans to enhance students' executive functions (attention, decision-making) in virtual reality environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
